snippet: Some of Washington’s leading lobbyists are mounting a concerted push to earn, if not respectability, then at least something less than public disdain.
abstract: Some of Washington's leading lobbyists are mounting a concerted push to improve their negative public image; effort includes pro bono work, ethics training and tightened disclosure requirements.
lead_paragraph: Some of Washington’s leading lobbyists are mounting a concerted push to earn, if not respectability, then at least something less than public disdain.

headline.main: Tired of ‘Tainted’ Image, Lobbyists Try Makeover
headline.print_headline: Tired of ‘Tainted’ Image, Lobbyists Try Makeover
